body: there needs to be a tag that sperates what they consider femdom into two categories. shit like this I can blacklist, and everything else, where even just a slightly bossy girl gets the femdom tag.

I mean, this level of femdom isn't really my type of thing. The sex is nice though. Just not... everything else that involves being treated like shit. Then again I wouldn't be turned on from that much sexual abuse in the first place... would mostly be busy rethinking my life choices.
I'm gonna bitch about whatever I want because Darwinism should have already weeded out all these beta males

Guys, if you dont like femdoms and subboys than dont read manga that has them in them. Just read what youre into and move on. I dont like "lose of virginity" type mange but i dont go under comment sections of them and complain about them. So chill and let people be in what theyre into.
No balls were harmed in the making of this doujin. And especially no hammers were involved.
